features.additionalInfo: Access your own business funds to pay bills and suppliers online, over the phone or in person.
Rather than wait hours or days for payments from another bank to clear, receive money almost instantly, so you know exactly where your business stands financially.

Each assisted transaction will be chargeable. At the end of each month, the Bank will rank these transactions in the following order: 1. Quick Deposits - cash and cheque deposits 2. Cheque transactions 3. Assisted transactions.
Streamline your business banking and save time with automatic data feeds from your online banking to your accounting software.
See, track and easily pay your bills online in NetBank.
You choose which invoices to use for finance, and when - the platform is available to use 24/7.
Stream is available on NetBank and Commbiz for your online banking needs.
A self-service platform that connects with Xero, MYOB, QuickBooks or other accounting software, providing an easily reconciled source of truth.
Funding is up to 80% of the value of outstanding invoices; the funding available will grow in line with your sales.
No monthly account keeping fees for the Stream Working Capital Transaction Account. Other fees will be detailed in your Letter of Offer and may include: a line fee and an establishment fee.
Pay and receive payments in realtime.
Stream Working Capital's dashboard shows real-time adjustments and balance reports to give you peace of mind about your cash flow position.

Unlimited CommBank ATM withdrawals in Australia. Each assisted transaction will be chargeable. Please note Access and NetBank Service Fees may apply and are excluded from the unlimited electronic transactions. Additional fees apply for: international transactions, travellers cheques, foreign currency and sending money overseas; special banking services, such as bank cheques and special clearance of cheques.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Only business may apply for the account.
Available to B2B customers issuing invoices to the value of AUD$15,000 per month or more.
To use the platform, you'll need a Stream Working Capital Transaction Account to get your invoices paid into.
To be eligible you need to have a valid ABN.

fees.name: Coin handling fee
fees.additionalInfo: The coin handling is 1% of the total value of the coin component of all deposit and withdrawal transactions, where the total value of coins handled exceeds $1,000 per day. This fee is debited on the day the transactions are processed. This fee does not apply to deposits made via QuickCash envelopes.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $5 per payment. Charged to the account, due to insufficient available funds, when we are unable to debit the account after five attempts.

fees.name: Note handling fee
fees.additionalInfo: The note handling is 0.25% of the total value of the notes component of all deposit and withdrawal transactions, where the total value of notes handled exceeds $50,000 per day. This fee is debited on the day the transactions are processed. This fee does not apply to deposits made via QuickCash envelopes.

fees.name: Ad Hoc Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you order a statement or request a reprint of a past statement.

fees.name: Overdraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you exceed the available funds in your account or any agreed overdraft limit on a given day. Additional interest may apply on overdrawn amounts.

fees.name: Monthly Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No monthly account keeping fees.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A paper statement fee applies to account when you request a paper copy of an account statement outside the standard cycle.

fees.name: Line fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee that is charged regularly as set out in your Letter of Offer. Fees charged may vary due to a number of factors relating to the application.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Any other cash withdrawal overseas: AUD $5 plus 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Any other cash withdrawal overseas: AUD $5 plus 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Maestro (EFTPOS) or Visa Debit Card or Debit MasterCard purchase in Australian dollars: 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Maestro (EFTPOS) or Visa Debit Card or Debit MasterCard purchase in foreign currency: 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Withdrawals or transfers made via telephone banking using an operator
fees.additionalInfo: Withdrawals or transfers made via telephone banking using an operator.

fees.name: CommBank ATMs outside Australia
fees.additionalInfo: The fee is charged to the account at the time of the withdrawal. This fee may be charged for each withdrawal you make through ATMs and Maestro, Cirrus, MasterCard or Visa Plus networks outside Australia.

fees.name: Assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Withdrawals made over the counter at a Commonwealth Bank branch, Australia Post office or private agency (including EFTPOB/Bank@Post).

fees.name: Commonwealth Bank ATM cash withdrawals in Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Free cash withdrawals from any Commonwealth Bank ATMs in Australia.

fees.name: EFTPOS in Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Cash withdrawals or purchases made via EFTPOS in Australia or utilising the 'credit' option with your Business Visa Debit Card or Debit MasterCard.

fees.name: Cheques transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Cheques written by you and negotiated through the clearing system. Cheques deposited to your account (including cheques deposited via Quick Deposits or QuickCash envelope banking).

fees.name: Assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Cheques drawn on your account and cashed over the counter at any CommBank branch.

fees.name: Assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Deposits made over the counter at a CommBank branch, Australia Post office or private agency (including EFTPOB/ Bank@Post).

fees.name: Quick Deposits
fees.additionalInfo: Deposits made via the Quick Deposit Box or QuickCash envelope banking.

fees.name: Electronic transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Customers with a Stream Working Capital Transaction Account are entitled to unlimited free electronic transactions. Please note Access and NetBank Service Fees may apply and are excluded from the unlimited electronic transactions.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged may vary due to a number of factors relating to the application and will be detailed your Letter of Offer.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: For each day your account remains overdrawn, Excess Debit Interest will be applied. The interest rate is calculated daily on the portion of the debit balance which exceeds the limit.
For each day your account remains overdrawn, Excess Debit Interest will be applied. The interest rate is calculated daily on the portion of the debit balance which exceeds the limit.
Custom interest rate with interest rate margins based on your circumstances. Interest is only charged on the amount you draw down. Calculated daily on the outstanding balance.

data.name: Stream Working Capital
data.description: Stream Working Capital is a digital working capital finance solution that gives businesses, that sell on credit terms, access to funds sized and secured by invoices.
